subclass.name: Oath of Liberation

features.name: Tenets of Liberation
entries: The Tenets of Liberation teach to the paladin that freedom and free will are the most precious goods and that no one negates them to anyone. Tyranny is a crime, Slavery is a heresy.

items.name: Freedom.
items.entries: Everyone is born free. Everyone deserves to choose his path.

items.name: Rebellion
items.entries: Fight tyranny, free the oppressed. Defend those who can't defend themself.

items.name: Respect.
items.entries: Your freedom ends where that of others begins. Be respectful.

items.name: Responsibility.
items.entries: You are responsible for your own actions. Being free is an honor and a duty.

features.name: Oath Spells
entries: You gain oath spells at the paladin levels listed.

features.name: Channel Divinity
entries: When you take this oath at 3rd level, you gain the following two Channel Divinity options.

items.name: Incite Rebellion.
items.entries: As a Bonus action, choose another friendly creature you can see within 30ft. The target can spend its reaction to make a single melee attack against a creature within 5 ft of it. If the target is grappled or restrained, it gains advantage on this attack.

items.name: Unshackled.
items.entries: As a bonus action, you can target a creature you can see within 30 ft and use your channel divinity. The target automatically free from restraints, manacles, magical binds or a creature that has it grappled.

features.name: Aura of Liberty
entries: As a bonus action, you can target a creature you can see within 30 ft and use your channel divinity. The target automatically free from restraints, manacles, magical binds or a creature that has it grappled.
At 18th level, the range of this aura increases to 30ft (9m).

features.name: Unbound Unbent Unbroken
entries: You are a free soul that no one can bend. Beginning at 15th level, you ignore difficult terrains and your speed cannot be reduced in any way.
When you are prone, standing up uses only 5 feet of your movement.

features.name: Savior of the Oppressed
entries: You become the very incarnation of the Principle of Liberty itself. As a bonus action, you gain the following benefits for 10 minutes:

items: You are immune to charmed, stunned, paralyzed, petrified and restrained conditions.
You gain a flying speed of 60ft and you can hover.
As a bonus action, you can touch a willing creature within 5ft and teleport it to an unoccupied space of your choice that you can see within 30ft.

entries: Once you use this feature, you can’t use it again until you finish a long rest, unless you expend a 5th-level spell slot to use it again.
